protein.specific_function: ATP dependent phosphorylation of adenosine and other related nucleoside analogs to monophosphate derivatives. Serves as a potential regulator of concentrations of extracellular adenosine and intracellular adenine nucleotides.

go_class.description: phosphotransferase activity, alcohol group as acceptor
positive regulation of T cell proliferation
